A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed The Last Jedi. It makes me want to see the first three entries from this franchise. I really have only seen the last 2 or 3 and I would like to compare since the last few really seem to follow the same blueprint. There were some great individual performances in this instalment and some thrilling moments. Great film\, definitely will watch the next one even though Im not a die hard Star Wars fan.
